settings.subtitle: Our Story
settings.title: About Angel Hair
settings.description: Discover the passion and science behind our premium hair care products.

settings.title: Quality
settings.description: We use only the finest ingredients in our formulations, ensuring every product meets the highest standards of excellence.

settings.title: Sustainability
settings.description: We're committed to eco-friendly practices, from our packaging to our cruelty-free testing methods.

settings.title: Innovation
settings.description: Our team constantly researches and develops new formulas to bring you the latest in hair care science.

settings.title: Personalized Attention
settings.description: We believe every hair type deserves special care. Our products are designed to meet diverse hair needs.

settings.mission_text: To provide professional-grade hair care products that transform and nourish hair, making salon-quality results accessible to everyone.
settings.vision_text: To become the leading name in hair care, recognized worldwide for our commitment to quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction.

settings.subtitle: Get in Touch
settings.title: Contact Us
settings.description: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you!
